title: Russian Warriors: Sukhois, MiGs and Tupolevs
description: One of the largest post-war air arms the world has ever known, the former Military Aviation Force controlled over 12,000 aircraft spread over Europe and Asia. The Red Star adorned all manner of combat types ranging from the awesome Tu-160 Blackjack through to the humble Be-12 Mail, and came to symbolise the leading edge of Soviet technology.
author: Roy Braybrook
